House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08167
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL SEX OFFENDER REGISTRATION DATABASE AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Intends to provide a national data base registration for sex-related offenders in order for the public to be apprised of the identity of these culprits and also to benefit the non-governmental entities engaged in the advocacy for women and children’s protection. Provides that there shall be a listing of persons convicted of criminal offenses against a victim who is a minor or of sexually violent offenses.
